trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" /> to use with a class.
trans-unit.target: 指定要与类一起使用的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When you create a component that you want to license, you must specify the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider> by marking the component with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 当创建一个组件，你想要授予许可，你必须指定<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>通过标记该组件<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute.LicenseProvider%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Type> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute.LicenseProvider%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Type>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57).
trans-unit.target: 有关许可的详细信息，请参阅[How to： 许可证组件和控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.SharedState>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>特性应用于此类具有以下<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>属性值： <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource.SharedState>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider> as the license provider for `MyControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider>为的许可证提供程序`MyControl`。

trans-unit.source: The next code example creates an instance of the `MyControl` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的实例`MyControl`类。

trans-unit.source: Then, it gets the attributes for the class, and prints the name of the license provider used by `myNewControl`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取的属性类，并输出由许可证提供程序的名称`myNewControl`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> class without a license provider.
trans-unit.target: 在没有许可证提供程序的情况下，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the license provider class.
trans-unit.target: 许可证提供程序类的完全限定名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> class with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的类型初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type of the license provider class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示许可证提供程序类的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> class with the specified type of license provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定类型的许可证提供程序初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value, which is no provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认值，即无提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This <see langword="static" /> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see langword="static" /> 字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Another object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示此实例与指定对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is equal to this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 等于此实例，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.LicenseProviderAttribute" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the license provider that must be used with the associated class.
trans-unit.target: 获取必须与该关联类一起使用的许可证提供程序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type of the license provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示许可证提供程序的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates a unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 指示此特性类型的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: A unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 此特性类型的唯一 ID。
